names.english: powder of tortois plastron, brucea, eretmochelydis and sargassum
names.commonEnglish: Powder of Tortoise Plastron, Brucea, Eretmochelydis and Sargassum

actions: Sedates the Heart, quiets the Spirit, calms the Liver, calms and anchors Liver Yang, extinguishes Wind, settles convulsions, stops spasms, clears Heat and resolves toxicity.
Reduces Phlegm and softens areas of hardness and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Nourishes Yin, anchors Yang, nourishes the Blood, enriches Yin, tonifies the Heart and treats non-healing sores and ulcerations
Cools Heat, resolves toxicity, expels Dampness, cools the Blood, softens hardness and treats cancer caused by Toxic Heat.
Relieves toxicity, reduces swellings, alleviates pain, opens the Orifices, awakens consciousness, tonifies the Heart, attacks toxins, reduces swellings, resists cancer and stops panic.
Inhibits the growth of cancer cells
notes: Roast all the ingredients except Chan Su in an earthen pot until yellow. Add 0.6g Chan Su and pound into a fine powder. Take 0.6 grams twice a day.
